scripts.build-browser: cd cb_browser_ui && npm install && npm run build
scripts.watch-browser: cd cb_browser_ui && npm install && npm start
scripts.build-server: git describe > .version && npm run ensure-tooling -- -q && RUSTC_WRAPPER=sccache cargo build --release
scripts.build-server-bundle: git describe > .version && npm run ensure-tooling -- -q && cargo build --release --features embed_assets
scripts.build: echo 'BUILDING SERVER' && npm run build-server && echo 'BUILDING BROWSER UI' && npm run build-browser
scripts.lint-clippy-server: echo 'CHECKING BEST PRACTISES (cb_simulation)' && touch cb_simulation/src/lib.rs && cargo clippy
scripts.lint-clippy-browser: echo 'CHECKING BEST PRACTISES (cb_browser_ui) -- IGNORE js_export RELATED ERRORS' && touch cb_browser_ui/src/lib.rs && cd cb_browser_ui && (cargo clippy || true) && cd ..
scripts.lint-clippy: npm run lint-clippy-server && npm run lint-clippy-browser
scripts.lint: npm run lint-clippy && npm run lint-fmt
scripts.lint-check: npm run lint-clippy && npm run lint-fmt-check
